That doesn't matter right now.\""},{"lineNumber":15901,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、そういうの……気づいてなかったでしょ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But you didn't notice those things, did you?\""},{"lineNumber":15902,"originalJapaneseLine":"　普段は、遣いすぎなくらい気を遣うのに……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Usually, you care way too much...\""},{"lineNumber":15903,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それくらい、おかしかったわよ。ランは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ran was acting that strange.\""},{"lineNumber":15904,"originalJapaneseLine":"「正直、だからランスさんありがとう、とは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly, so I'm not even a bit thankful to Lance-san...\""},{"lineNumber":15905,"originalJapaneseLine":"　カケラも思わないけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't feel that at all...\""},{"lineNumber":15906,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあそりゃそうね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, that's natural.\""},{"lineNumber":15907,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……結局、それは自分が招いた事、なのよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... in the end, that's something you brought upon yourself.\""},{"lineNumber":15908,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私がしっかりしていれば、防げたこと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If I had been more reliable, it could have been prevented...\""},{"lineNumber":15909,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……待ちなさい、ラン。ひとつだけ、確認させて。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Wait, Ran. Let me confirm just one thing.\""},{"lineNumber":15910,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これは、あんたが悪い話なの？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is this something that makes you the bad one?\""},{"lineNumber":15911,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんたの、何が悪いの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is it about you that's bad?\""},{"lineNumber":15912,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ……それ、は…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Th-that's...\""},{"lineNumber":15913,"originalJapaneseLine":"無意識に胸に置かれた手が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Unconsciously, the hand placed on her chest,"},{"lineNumber":15914,"originalJapaneseLine":"ギュッと握りしめられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"was clenched tightly."},{"lineNumber":15915,"originalJapaneseLine":"「悪いか、どうかは分からない……けど。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't know if it's bad or not... but."},{"lineNumber":15916,"originalJapaneseLine":"　原因は、私が……私の心が、弱いこと。","translatedEnglishLine":"The cause is me... my heart is weak."},{"lineNumber":15917,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ひとりでは生きられないくらい脆くて……でも」","translatedEnglishLine":"So fragile that I can't live alone... but\""},{"lineNumber":15918,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、わっ……！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what...!?\""},{"lineNumber":15919,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランの手が、志津香に伸びた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ran's hand reached out to Shizuka."},{"lineNumber":15920,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのまま、小さい身体がすっぽりと収まる。","translatedEnglishLine":"And her small body fit completely into her embrace."},{"lineNumber":15921,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラン……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ran...?\""},{"lineNumber":15922,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……よかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... I'm glad."},{"lineNumber":15923,"originalJapaneseLine":"　仲間が……無事だった」","translatedEnglishLine":"My comrades... were safe.\""},{"lineNumber":15924,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ラン…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ran...\""},{"lineNumber":15925,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう……馬鹿ね。しっかりしてよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're such an idiot. Pull yourself together...\""},{"lineNumber":15926,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんな、頼りにしてるんだから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone's counting on you...\""},{"lineNumber":15927,"originalJapaneseLine":"抱きしめられたままの志津香が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Shizuka, still embraced,"},{"lineNumber":15928,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランの頭を優しく撫でた。","translatedEnglishLine":"gently stroked Ran's head."},{"lineNumber":15929,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、ランさん。こんにちは」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Ran-san. Hello.\""},{"lineNumber":15930,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、元気か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, how are you?\""},{"lineNumber":15931,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……どうも」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Thanks.\""},{"lineNumber":15932,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー、今日も美人だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, you're beautiful today as well."},{"lineNumber":15933,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よーし、後でまた…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, later again...\""},{"lineNumber":15934,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスさん。全部、みんなから聞きました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance-san. I heard everything from everyone.\""},{"lineNumber":15935,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":15936,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスさんなりに考えての行動だと思います。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I think your actions were what you thought best, Lance-san."},{"lineNumber":15937,"originalJapaneseLine":"　色々と、私に原因がある事とも思います」","translatedEnglishLine":"I also think that there are various reasons related to me.\""},{"lineNumber":15938,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なぁんだ、バラしたのかあいつら……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, so those guys spilled the beans...\""},{"lineNumber":15939,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、キミが心配でな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, I was worried about you after all.\""},{"lineNumber":15940,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……弄んでる間はだいぶ楽しそうでしたけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Though you seemed to be having quite a bit of fun while toying with them.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やっぱり……本当なんだ。
ランスさんが、嘘をついて……それで、皆も……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lance-san was lying... and because of that, everyone too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスはただゲスなだけだろうけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lance is probably just a scoundrel, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 事前に止められたなら、
私たちも止めてたと思うけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I think we would have stopped it too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……でも、マリア達はマリア達で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...But Maria and the others, for their part,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランを心配してたのよ」
「お姉様もでしょ？」
「……うるさい。今はそれはいいの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Be quiet. That doesn't matter right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、そういうの……気づいてなかったでしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you didn't notice those things, did you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 普段は、遣いすぎなくらい気を遣うのに……
「それくらい、おかしかったわよ。ランは」
「正直、だからランスさんありがとう、とは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Honestly, so I'm not even a bit thankful to Lance-san..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カケラも思わないけど……」
「まあそりゃそうね」
「でも……結局、それは自分が招いた事、なのよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... in the end, that's something you brought upon yourself."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私がしっかりしていれば、防げたこと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If I had been more reliable, it could have been prevented..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……待ちなさい、ラン。ひとつだけ、確認させて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Wait, Ran. Let me confirm just one thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは、あんたが悪い話なの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is this something that makes you the bad one?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんたの、何が悪いの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What is it about you that's bad?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無意識に胸に置かれた手が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unconsciously, the hand placed on her chest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ギュッと握りしめられる。
「悪いか、どうかは分からない……けど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't know if it's bad or not... but.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 原因は、私が……私の心が、弱いこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The cause is me... my heart is weak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとりでは生きられないくらい脆くて……でも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So fragile that I can't live alone... but"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランの手が、志津香に伸びた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ran's hand reached out to Shizuka.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのまま、小さい身体がすっぽりと収まる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And her small body fit completely into her embrace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも……よかった。
仲間が……無事だった」
「もう……馬鹿ね。しっかりしてよ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're such an idiot. Pull yourself together..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんな、頼りにしてるんだから……」
抱きしめられたままの志津香が、
ランの頭を優しく撫でた。
「あっ、ランさん。こんにちは」
「おっ、元気か？」
「……どうも」
「んー、今日も美人だな。
よーし、後でまた…………」
「ランスさん。全部、みんなから聞きました」
「ランスさんなりに考えての行動だと思います。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I think your actions were what you thought best, Lance-san.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色々と、私に原因がある事とも思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I also think that there are various reasons related to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なぁんだ、バラしたのかあいつら……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, so those guys spilled the beans..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、キミが心配でな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I was worried about you after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……弄んでる間はだいぶ楽しそうでしたけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Though you seemed to be having quite a bit of fun while toying with them."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
